member.name: M:OrchardCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.ModelStateDictionaryExtensions.AddModelError(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.ModelStateDictionary,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified error message to the errors collection for the model-state dictionary that is associated with the specified key.
